resources.string: First Select Where You Want To Place Your Ultimate Vessel
Now Select Where You Want To Place Your Big Ship
Now Select Where You Want To Place Your Medium Ship
Now Select Where You Want To Place Your Little Ship
Now Select Where You Want To Place Your Baby Boat

Welcome to Vessel Skirmish! Place your vessels in a strategic arrangement your opponent could never guess and try to guess where they placed theirs. Consecutive successful hits will grant you(as well as your opponent) special abilities. Good luck!
